meanings.definition: Not showing or feeling opposition or hostility.
meanings.sent1: The team had a nonantagonistic meeting to discuss the project.
meanings.sent2: The nonantagonistic neighbors always greeted each other with a smile.
meanings.sent3: The nonantagonistic cat and dog played together peacefully in the yard.
meanings.sent4: The nonantagonistic relationship between the two countries led to successful trade agreements.
meanings.sent5: The nonantagonistic atmosphere in the classroom made learning enjoyable for everyone.

meanings.definition: Not causing or involving conflict or opposition.
meanings.sent1: The nonantagonistic decision was easily accepted by all team members.
meanings.sent2: The nonantagonistic solution resolved the issue without any arguments.
meanings.sent3: The nonantagonistic traffic flow made the commute surprisingly smooth.
meanings.sent4: The nonantagonistic colors of the painting blended harmoniously.
meanings.sent5: The nonantagonistic tone of the conversation kept things pleasant and cooperative.
